医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
精英足球运动员的菜单上有什么？研究表明饮食习惯因性别和比赛水平而异最近的研究表明，精英足球运动员的饮食习惯受到其竞技水平和性别的影响，男性偏爱碳水化合物，女性偏爱瘦肉。研究结果强调需要量身定制的营养指导来优化表现和健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Whats-on-the-menu-for-elite-soccer-players-Study-reveals-dietary-habits-vary-by-gender-and-competition-级别.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Whats-on-the-menu-for-elite-soccer-players-Study-reveals-dietary-habits-vary-by-gender-and-competition- level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=479acd0b-6ca2-4ac1-97bd-46148a208085 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 20:38:00 -0400 What's on the menu for elite soccer players? Study reveals dietary habits vary by gender and competition level
母亲百日咳疫苗接种可增强婴儿长达八个月的保护在澳大利亚的一项大规模研究中，母亲在怀孕期间接种疫苗可显着提高八个月以下婴儿的百日咳抵抗力。虽然它稍微降低了婴儿常规疫苗接种的有效性，但并没有增加感染风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Maternal-pertussis-vaccination-boosts-infant-protection-up-to-eight-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Maternal-pertussis-vaccination-boosts-infant-protection-up-to-eight-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02009245-771d-4dc6-9f9f-d74e1e2d786d Wed, 11 Oct 2023 20:04:00 -0400 Maternal pertussis vaccination boosts infant protection up to eight months
特定的导航错误可能表明阿尔茨海默病的早期迹象伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项使用虚拟现实的新研究表明，患有早期阿尔茨海默病的人在行走时难以转身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Specific-navigational-errors-may-indicate-early-signs-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Specific-navigational-errors-may-indicate-early-signs-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a7c9f2b-1039-4966-aacb-ffe35f4070e7 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 14:44:30 -0400 Specific navigational errors may indicate early signs of Alzheimer’s disease
新的人工智能工具利用进化、生物信息预测未来的病毒变异COVID-19 大流行似乎是一场永不停歇的 SARS-CoV-2 变种游行，每种变种都配备了逃避免疫系统的新方法，让世界为接下来的情况做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-tool-predicts-future-viral-variants-using-evolutionary-biological-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-tool-predicts-future-viral-variants-using-evolutionary-biological-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d246fdb4-68bc-4fa3-bb37-10e101e9b8a7 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 14:35:09 -0400 New AI tool predicts future viral variants using evolutionary, biological information
1540万美元的赠款将用于招募医学生，以更好地照顾服务不足的人群一项新的 1540 万美元赠款将帮助印第安纳大学医学院招募和教育医学生，以更好地照顾服务不足的人群，以期改善印第安纳州的医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/24154-million-grant-will-target-recruitment-of-medical-students-to-better-care-for-underserved-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/24154-million-grant-will-target-recruitment-of-medical-students-to-better-care-for-underserved-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c87af3ef-401b-4f76-8a6c-376ee6ffe431 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 14:24:15 -0400 $15.4 million grant will target recruitment of medical students to better care for underserved populations
慢性肾病可能会增加西班牙裔/拉丁裔成年人心脏骤停的风险根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的新研究，慢性肾病可能会增加拉美裔/拉丁裔成年人的风险并预测心脏骤停。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Chronic-kidney-disease-may-increase-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-arrest-among-HispanicLatino-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Chronic-kidney-disease-may-increase-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-arrest-among-HispanicLatino-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cdd823b-3bab-4143-b58f-2ea89f7676d4 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 14:20:41 -0400 Chronic kidney disease may increase risk of sudden cardiac arrest among Hispanic/Latino adults
科学家鉴定出近十几个与冠状动脉钙化有关的基因一个国际科学家小组发现了近十几个导致冠状动脉钙积聚的基因，这些基因可能导致危及生命的冠状动脉疾病，这种疾病导致美国四分之一的人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Scientists-identify-nearly-a-dozen-genes-responsible-for-coronary-artery-calcification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Scientists-identify-nearly-a-dozen-genes-responsible-for-coronary-artery-calcification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ffb162c-41cc-4190-9ee2-5d2400ee108b Wed, 11 Oct 2023 14:14:54 -0400 Scientists identify nearly a dozen genes responsible for coronary artery calcification
新的人工智能模型可以识别容易受到年龄相关变化影响的神经解剖区域衰老的大脑会经历结构和细胞变化，这些变化会影响功能并增加对阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病的易感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-model-can-identify-neuroanatomical-regions-vulnerable-to-age-lated-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-model-can-identify-neuroanatomical-regions-vulnerable-to-age-lated-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3452760-da81-40ff-9c39-a2dc2fcbb0b8 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 12:59:51 -0400 New AI model can identify neuroanatomical regions vulnerable to age-related changes
细胞疗法的最新进展在这次采访中，NewsMedical 与 James Brady 讨论了细胞疗法以及基因工程领域的变革。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Recent-Advancements-in-Cell-Based-Therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Recent-Advancements-in-Cell-Based-Therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=655635f4-b099-48ec-9172-e9cd4d8a2b5e Wed, 11 Oct 2023 12:00:00 -0400 Recent Advancements in Cell Based Therapy
迈向异种移植：转基因猪肾被证明在非人类灵长类动物中可行研究人员使用基因工程猪捐赠者来开发肾移植物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Towards-xenotransplantation-Genetically-altered-pig-kidneys-prove-viable-in-non- human-primates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Towards-xenotransplantation-Genetically-altered-pig-kidneys-prove-viable-in-non- human-primates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cbd5b16-1142-47c2-b4a3-44c40785831f Wed, 11 Oct 2023 11:21:00 -0400 Towards xenotransplantation: Genetically altered pig kidneys prove viable in non-human primates
